Empath::

"Some plan," the femme snorts, her combative Predacon nature getting 
the better of her.  "We risk a half-dozen or so units to save one?  
That would seem to fall under the category of wasteful actions, 
Katya - not to mention poor strategy."  Empath is deliberately 
baiting the Clan warrior by using her own principles against her.  
She has no doubt Katya will come up with a counter-argument.  Whether 
that rebuttal will be verbal or physical is another matter.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : :
> Kup nodded as Katya explained.
> Kup: That's the plan, and we've selected you lucky *cough* few to 
help.
>  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:Katya 
stepped up and stood proud.
> 
> Katya: As you all know, Ragnar and I are not Transformers but humans
> stock into mech bodies. We do not come from here. In fact, there 
might
> be a possibility for us to go back to where we come from, but there 
is
> one problem. We were not alone.
> 
> She pauses, then continues.
> 
> Katya: Vladimir Ward, Khan of Clan Wolf, is here too. We have 
located
> him in the Predacon base as a prisoner. It is unthinkable to leave
> this place without him. Thus, Kup and I have planned to raid the 
base
> and extract Khan Ward. That is the situation.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > "Better get to the point," Empath growls as she takes a 
seat.  "I've 
> > got better things to do with my time than participate in some 
hare-
> > brained rescue operation."
> > 
> > Wheeljack scrambles to his feet and hops into the nearest empty 
chair.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Katya looks at Kup.
> > > 
> > > Katya: I think we are all here.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> > > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > Wheeljack-X::
> > > > 
> > > > Jackie plows into the room in vehicle mode, still going at an 
> > overly 
> > > > hasty rate.  "Gangway!" he yells.  Transforming to robot mode 
in 
> > mid-
> > > > trip, the white-and-grey Autobot flips himself so he goes 
over 
> > the 
> > > > table instead of into it.  His every movement seems graceful -
 
> > until 
> > > > he does a classic spread-eagle faceplant on the other side of 
the 
> > > > room instead of landing on his feet.  "Ow.  Gotta work on 
that 
> > one."
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Kup : : 
> > > > > Kup: Haha, glad that you guys could make it. Settle down 
> > though. 
> > > > I'll explain what's going on when the others arrive. 
> > > > > Kup then recieved Rodimus' message. 
> > > > > Kup(via commlink): I read you, lad, no problem. Good luck 
with 
> > > > whatever it is. I'll talk to you later. 
> > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: 
> > Owlhawk 
> > > > finally came out of the CR chamber after a long rejuvenative
> > > > > sleep. He activated his commline.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Owlhawk: I got it Kup. I'll be there in a breeze.
> > > > > 
> > > > > He goes right to the briefing room.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Ragnar: Roger, wilco. Was there not also a tech named 
Flicker? 
> > I 
> > > > think
> > > > > he could help if we bring in heavy weapons.
> > > > > 
> > > > > He too soon appeared in the room.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Owlhawk: Glad to see you're all okay. What'd I miss? What's 
the 
> > > > plan?
> > > > > Can we go bust some Vok?
